subject: [YouTrack, Updated] Issue codio-6467: Points are not calculated for student from 'multiple choice' assessment type with MULTI response type of question (in some cases)
text:
Bug was updated by Igor Yashtykov in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 07:43.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6467 >codio-6467< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6467 > Points are not calculated for student from 'multiple choice' assessment type with MULTI response type of question (in some cases) Created by Igor Yashtykov  
If use that multi resoponse asessments type as separate in one unit then it's working good, i.e. points are calcualted.                                                                                                                                                                        
But if unit contains 2 types of multi choice asessment (single response and multi response) then after use sinlge response asessments other type (multi) doesn't calculate points.                                                                                                             
Video -< http://screencast.com/t/bYNAznO4pla > http://screencast.com/t/bYNAznO4pla
